previewArticle.title: Colorado Rapids vs. Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Colorado Rapids 4, Montreal Impact 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: First Half begins.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Colorado Rapids vs. Montreal Impact

timelineItems.desc: Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) hits the left post with a left footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Hernan Bernardello.
timelineItems.title: 2ND LOOK: Justin Mapp fires his shot off the post

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Tweet! Tweet! We're off between #COLvMTL. http://t.co/bkhs864vL3

timelineItems.comment: Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).
Delay in match Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: BLOCKED: Patrice Bernier closes down Deshorn Brown in Montreal territory

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Kamani Hill.
Attempt blocked. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Patrice Bernier.

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: Merci beaucoup @pbernier10  tu viens de sauver les meubles! #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) header from the left side of the six yard box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Marvell Wynne.

timelineItems.name: Matthew P Ronne
timelineItems.text: Bernier and Perkins in panic mode are better than a streaking Deshorn #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Leçon de soccer de la part de @pbernier10 qui commet une erreur mais revient en défense pour effectuer un vol sur Deshorn Brown. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: Last year's Rookie of the Year, Dillon Powers, bags his first goal of the season. http://t.co/790rfdmOwt #COLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Rapids-MileHighClub
timelineItems.text: Montreal too busy chasing right now, trying to do a little of what Chivas did though on the counter #COLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Nicolas Gaillard
timelineItems.text: L'entente #Mapp / #McInenrney fait plaisir à voir. Ces 2 là peuvent faire des étincelles pour #IMFC ! #COLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Jasen Asay
timelineItems.text: Montreal's jerseys remind me of this guy. #COLvMTL #Rapids96 #BringBackRapidman http://t.co/ymK30Bj1PN

timelineItems.name: Jasen Asay
timelineItems.text: Montreal's jerseys remind me of this guy. #COLvMTL #Rapids96 #BringBackRapidman http://t.co/ymK30Bj1PN

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Colorado Rapids 4, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: No clean sheet for the #Rapids96 tonight. #IMFC pulls one back and the Rapids WIN 4-1. Man of the Match is, of course, Dillon Powers.

timelineItems.name: Steve Ramirez
timelineItems.text: MLS strikers will have fun scoring goals vs Montreal Impact, it's way too easy! A good way to boost your "goals" stats #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: There is so much and so little to say about this disaster of a game and disaster of a 2014 season #TSN690 #ImpactOnTSN690 #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: @ColoradoRapids open up their three game homestand with a big 4-1 win over @impactmontreal. http://t.co/Y1SHVj1oH9 #COLvMTL

timelineItems.desc: The Colorado Rapids and Montreal Impact meet in an interconference matchup as the clubs face off Saturday evening at Dick’s Sporting Goods Park.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Colorado Rapids vs Montreal Impact | May 24, 2014

timelineItems.comment: Foul by José Mari (Colorado Rapids).
Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Mike McGuire
timelineItems.text: Looks like INF is about to make his #imfc debut replacing an injured Nyassi

timelineItems.name: Anthony Coté
timelineItems.text: Ça nous prend Nyassi pour le Championnat canadien. L'Impact aurait dû commencer avec Issey. #impacttvasports #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Edson Buddle tries a through ball, but Deshorn Brown is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Rapids-MileHighClub
timelineItems.text: Brown can make some spectacular things happen, but he needs to learn to be patient too! #COLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Vous vouliez Issey, vous allez l'avoir. Il entre pour Nyassi. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Darius
timelineItems.text: I'm excited to see what Issey brings tonight #imfc

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: It's a shame that we're losing because we are actually playing well, and controlling the ball well. #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact).
José Mari (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: just hope journeyman #Issey can stay with #IMFC for at least 1 full season - wasn't happy to leave #TFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Dillon Serna with a cross.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Kamani Hill's rip from distance goes wide

timelineItems.name: Laurent
timelineItems.text: By now Rivas would of have probably tackled Brown from behind just to make sure he stops running so quickly and behind the back line #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Les arrières #IMFC n'ont pas la vitesse pour rivaliser avec les attaquants des Rapids, se doivent de jouer plus bas.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Clint Irwin. Big mitts. WATCH: http://t.co/2GCgD9yo6g #COLvMTL

timelineItems.desc: Penalty conceded by Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact) after a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Sanna Nyassi called for aggressive pulling in the box

timelineItems.comment: Penalty Colorado Rapids. Edson Buddle draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact) after a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.desc: Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the left side of the box.
timelineItems.title: POST: Deshorn Brown with an excellent shot, but it strays off target

timelineItems.comment: Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Dillon Powers.

timelineItems.name: Rapids-MileHighClub
timelineItems.text: WHEN.....When will Deshorn finally get one of those! Feel bad for the guy! #COLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Brown vient d'appuyer ma théorie sur la vitesse. Il a facilement débordé Lefèvre. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Thomas C.
timelineItems.text: L'IMFC joue très bien! Il manque la variable «chance» #IMFC #ImpactTvasports

timelineItems.name: Analog FM
timelineItems.text: Deshorn Brown has the pace, needs the finishing for #Rapids96.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.
Foul by Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids).
Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: Justin Mapp needs a haircut #imfc #seriously

timelineItems.name: Eric
timelineItems.text: Les gars ont l'air 4 fois trop fatigués pour l'effort réel fourni sur le terrain. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kamani Hill.

timelineItems.name: Élisabeth
timelineItems.text: Qui tweete encore sérieusement que l'Impact joue vraiment bien? Sérieux, t'écoutes quel match de foot pour trouver que ca c'est bien? #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from inside the box is saved.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 1, Montreal Impact 0. Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the center of the goal.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Dillon Powers.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Hustle play from Patrice Bernier. #COLvMTL http://t.co/iNE58EYEpX

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Eric Gorski
timelineItems.text: Yes, it just dropped 5 degrees. #Rapids96 http://t.co/2130XB3i3s

timelineItems.name: Eric Gorski
timelineItems.text: Yes, it just dropped 5 degrees. #Rapids96 http://t.co/2130XB3i3s

timelineItems.name: Steve-O
timelineItems.text: Sa tellement l'air facile pour les Rapids de se créer des chances franches ! #imfc #ImpactTVASports

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Les joueurs accusent déjà l'effort. Brown semble mûr pour marquer chaque fois qu'il touche la balle. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact).
Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: jsbournival
timelineItems.text: avez vous remarqué? quand on a plein de possession on tir pas au but pis on est minable, mais c aussi le cas quand on a pas de poss. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Thor Morgan
timelineItems.text: Love Powers motioning Hill to press Camara for the ball #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: François Séguin
timelineItems.text: J'suis pas connaisseur, mais le fond du baril, c'est ca? #imfc

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Colorado Rapids 1, Montreal Impact 0.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Mi-temps à #COLvMTL 1-0 sur un penalty controversé, mais de grosses occasions pour Colorado ensuite, dont un tir sur le poteau

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: Je suis tanné d'avoir une équipe qui a du coeur, je veux une équipe qui gagne #IMFC #ToutPourGagner

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Le problème avec la défense haute, c'est l'espace qu'on laisse derrière. #IMFC n'arrive pas à le gérer. C'est Brown qui se régale.

timelineItems.name: Benoit Normand
timelineItems.text: Quand même ironique que quand notre coach était suisse notre défensive avait moins de trou! #IMFC #lapognetu? #Jokedefromage #Saputo

timelineItems.name: Brian Mercer
timelineItems.text: Go #Rapids96!

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Colorado Rapids 1, Montreal Impact 0.
Offside, Montreal Impact. Jeb Brovsky tries a through ball, but Jack McInerney is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: #IMFC bon en première mi-temps, mais doit être plus tranchant dans le dernier 1/3. Bonne 2e mi-temps a tous. #ImpactTVASports #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: And the second half is under way here at Dick's Sporting Good's Park. #Rapids96 #COLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Deshorn Brown.

timelineItems.text: Why can't they play like Madrid? #imfc

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Le ballon bouge bien donc le milieu de terrain est capable de construire un minimum mais défensivement, c'est cosi-cosa #imfc #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Burgundy Wave
timelineItems.text: Is Pablo fining players for taking first-time shots or what #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Di Vaio watch: Il est le seul à s'entraîner pour le moment. On devrait le voir bientôt. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) hits the left post with a left footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Hernán Bernardello.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Mapp poteau. Toujours le meilleur de siens. #espoir #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Ce poteau est magnétique. #Mapp #Brown #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Christian Lecompte
timelineItems.text: Je ne croyais pas possible de voir un défenseur plus lent que Nesta l'an passé. #pearce #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: L'effet #Mappillon est magique, précis (trop p-e) et primordial pour #IMFC #IMFClive Joli poteau

timelineItems.name: Stéphane Demers
timelineItems.text: Felipe ferme ton bouche, lève ton cul et joue #iMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Hill qui marque. La pente va être dure à remonter 2-0 Colorado #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Burgundy Wave
timelineItems.text: KAMA KAMA KAMA KAMA KAMA KAMANI HILL #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: YMG
timelineItems.text: Je ne sais pas trop quoi penser! #imfc

timelineItems.text: #LesFansMeritentMieux #imfc

timelineItems.name: Lionel Villalonga
timelineItems.text: Erreur de Brovsky. Même des 10ans savent qu'on ne se dégage pas en plein centre #ImpactTVASports #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Rapids South Stands
timelineItems.text: Man, I missed out sitting in my beloved South Stands due to the flash flood watch. It's dry, but the floodgates have opened for #rapids96 .

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Shane O'Neill piles it on. @ColoradoRapids now up 3-0 over @impactmontreal in the 58th minute. #COLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Great response from #Rapids96 after all the offense questions. Again, could easily bet 5-0 right now.

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: Si je comprends bien, on va tout donner en championnat canadien maintenant? #IMFC #Sarcasme

timelineItems.name: Martin Binette

timelineItems.name: Eric
timelineItems.text: Il y aura des changements, je vous le garantis, part two. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Matthieu Stréliski
timelineItems.text: À lire les tweets, je fais bien de ne pas regarder le match de l’#IMFC. La saison va être longue.

timelineItems.name: Emma
timelineItems.text: My wonderful, beautiful #rapids96. This is incredible soccer. I LOVE YOU BOYS. <3 @ColoradoRapids #COLvMTL

timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: Go big or go home when you're scoring your first career MLS goal. http://t.co/xSkJ8RpyPW #COLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: FUN FACT: All three goals scored by #Rapids96 players each players’ first goals of season (Powers, Hill, O’Neill). #FunFact

timelineItems.comment: Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact).
Clint Irwin (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Eric
timelineItems.text: Y a juste Bernier qui joue. Ces gars ne veulent pas. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Élisabeth
timelineItems.text: Si vraiment on a signé Piatti, il doit être en extase de s'en venir ici.. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Who's your #Rapids96 Man of the Match? #COLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Has Saputo written an apology to #IMFC fans on Twitter yet? Or will that come at full time?

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Hernán Bernardello tries a through ball, but Andrés Romero is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 4, Montreal Impact 0. Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Dillon Powers finds space in the box and fires into the far corner

timelineItems.name: Marco Chayet
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 #SumittClub Best sports VIP experience in Denver. And I have tickets to everything.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: 4-0. Pas la faute de l'arbitre celui-là. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: First four-goal output of the season for #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Maggie Johnson
timelineItems.text: Nice turn Dillon Powers!! Beautiful pass from Marlon. Wow what a game. 4-0!! #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Alex Cayer
timelineItems.text: Klopas n'y croit même pas lui-même, pourquoi les joueurs y croiraient? Le club a touché le fond, c'est pas Piatti qui va changer tout #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Dillion Powers. If you're gonna score one you might as well score two. @ColoradoRapids rampant, 4-0, over @impactmontreal. #COLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Greyson Knutson
timelineItems.text: What on earth is wrong with #IMFC? Besides everything

timelineItems.name: Matthew P Ronne
timelineItems.text: Don't waste all your goals on Montreal #Rapids96

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 4, Montreal Impact 1. Andres Romero (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Andres Romero dissects the Colorado defense and blasts into the bottom corner

timelineItems.name: Élisabeth
timelineItems.text: Ah un but. Tiens. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: Holy Crap Romero! I can't believe that goal. #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Dillon Powers tries a through ball, but Danny Mwanga is caught offside.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: MZ_Azzurro11
timelineItems.text: What a goal and effort from Romero! Now can u do it 3 more times? #IMFClive #imfc

timelineItems.name: NatashaOjedaBanditto
timelineItems.text: La remontada!!! #lol #imfc

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Est-ce que Joey Saputo va rester silencieux sur twitter ou juste cacher son jeu et agir? #IMFC #IMFCLIVE

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: BUUUUT! Andrés Romero takes it to the house and pulls one back for @impactmontreal. 4-1 now. #COLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Danny Mwanga (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Heath Pearce (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.desc: Shane O'Neill (Colorado Rapids) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Shane O'Neill booked for dragging down Nakajima-Farran

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: .@c38sg supporters in the terrace loudly serenading the #Rapids96 now with "Mountain Roads"

timelineItems.name: marcom
timelineItems.text: Bizarro world. Goal of the week nomination for Romero? #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Issey Nakajima-Farran (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Shane O'Neill (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: John Rosch
timelineItems.text: So the #Rapids96 have two goals that should get nominated for GOTW. What are the chances that they both get it?

timelineItems.name: John Rosch
timelineItems.text: Twitter is way more fun when the #Rapids96 play like this

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Second Half ends, Colorado Rapids 4, Montreal Impact 1.
